data.title: Zebbler Studios
data.meta_description: Zebbler Studios was tasked with creating this video remix of "Deja Vu" by Casey Demond. New scenes were added to the original video, which was further modified to fit with ...
data.text:
Casey Desmond is a musician and artist who writes, produces, plays instruments, and makes her own clothes. After being featured on NBC’s “The Voice”, she recorded her debut LP titled Deja Vu, and asked Zebbler Encanti Experience to remix the title track. Once the audio remix was complete, Zebbler Studios shot and edited a new music video featuring new scenes and audio-reactive editing, merging Casey’s style with ZEE’s dancefloor-friendly vibe.

music video / sound design / choreography / post

Zebbler Studios “Deja Vu” video remix could be viewed below.
